column5: Just thought I'd share these with the other hockey nuts out there.....yes even the Leafs fans might enjoy them.  From a diehard Sens fan, game 1 was amazing! It was my birthday too which made it that much sweeter to win GM 1.  Few Pics from warmups.......I'm not really sure who 87 is for Pittsburgh, he must be a late call-up from the minors or something?   If you're wondering why Fleury played so poorly, I got in his head bigtime!   Not sure why the Sens came out flying? The place was ELECTRIC!   Nice action shot from the second period.   And remember.....
happy belated b-day, ur a lucky man, i wish i was closer to ottawa to unload those tickets for you,

Cool pics.....now I'm really excited....I just bought 4 tickets last night....but 2 different sets...oh well. I've been to a game before but never at ice level....I can't wait 5 rows up center ice.  Jason
Nice pics buddy. Nice to see a true Sens fan.Game wasn't even close .By the way who is that guy who wears 87 he seems like a whiner !!!!! GO SENS GO
Thanks. I just got rid of them....you should try to make it to a game, 100 times better atmosphere than the "Suit's" at the ACC in TO.  Enjoy the series guys and gals!
Enjoy it while it lasts, but remember Maggie the monkey picked the Pens  GO FLAMES GO
Nice pics!  Would have been nicer if it was the ACC, but what the heck, a couple of Sens playoff games never hurt anyone. (except Sens fans... )  Enjoy it while it lasts Ottawa...
And Maggie has the uncanny ability to pick the winners, it's true!  GO FLAMES GO!!!
